item.title: Buy this burger chain with more than 40% upside, says Loop Capital
item.description: The burger stock has little tariff risk, according to Loop Capital.

item.title: This 'safe haven' beverage stock is a buy with underappreciated growth potential, says Morgan Stanley
item.description: The Wall Street firm upgraded shares to overweight from equal weight.

item.title: Goldman Sachs gets bullish on this beauty stock with little tariff exposure
item.description: The stock can be a strong addition to investor portfolios as tariff and economic risks abound, according to Goldman Sachs.

item.title: Tuesday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The S&P 500 made a stunning comeback from its lows on Monday, bouncing from a 1.7% decline to close with a modest gain. Here's what's on CNBC's radar ...

item.title: These stocks have boosted their dividends by 15% or more, says Morgan Stanley
item.description: In this rocky market, dividend stocks may look more appealing to investors.
